item.orig: Put an item up for sale or offer to buy something.
item.trans: Metti un oggetto in vendita o offri di comprare qualcosa.

item.orig: Allow spawning item with missing mesh
item.trans: Permetti di creare oggetti senza modello

item.orig: Own attacks that missed the target
Guild message of the day (A short message):
Talk to people in your sector.
item.trans: Parla alle persone nel tuo settore.

item.orig: Sorry, no dictionary found. To use the spell checker get one
First name must contain more than two letters
Are you sure you want to discard the selected quest?
item.trans: Sei sicuro di voler cancellare la quest selezionata?

item.orig: A first and last name are required. You can use any alphabetic (A-Z) in your name, but no numbers. Each name must be between 3 and 27 letters. If your name is inappropriate, a Game Master (GM) will change it.
The number of octas that you may exchange.
Others' attacks that missed the target
item.trans: Attacchi altrui che hanno mancato l'obbiettivo

item.orig:
IMPORTANT: The following graphical options are available ONLY in the PlaneShift launcher. If you want to change any of those, you need to close this client, and relaunch PlaneShift. In the Launcher window, click on 'Settings' and 'Settings/Graphics'.
- Full screen or windowed mode (launcher only) - Resolution of the screen (launcher only) - Increase or lower graphical quality (launcher only)
We suggest you to try different settings and see what's best for your hardware.
Last name must contain more than two letters
%s has invited you to join a group. Click Yes to accept or No to reject.
item.trans: %s ti ha invitato ad aggregarti a un gruppo. Clicca Sì per accettare e No per rifiutare.

item.orig: You must select a petition from the list in order to cancel it.
item.trans: Devi selezionare una petizione della lista per poterla cancellare.

item.orig: Are you sure you want to upload?
Do you really want to reset these settings to default values?
Do you really wish to leave Yliakum?
The number of coins you wish to exchange.
The number of trias that you may exchange.
The number of trias you wish to withdraw.
You have been assigned to the selected petition.
item.trans: Sei stato assegnato alla petizione selezionata.

item.orig: Are you sure you want to upload your character?
item.trans: Sei sicuro di voler caricare il tuo personaggio?

item.orig: Own attacks that fail to penetrate the armor
No server running at the moment
item.trans: Non ci sono server attivi in questo momento

item.orig: This race isn't implemented yet, sorry
You have ignored the following players:
Others' attacks that fail to penetrate the armor

item.trans: Al momento non ci sono petizioni.

item.orig: Grouped with you and the same guild
Talk to everyone in your guild privately.
item.trans: Parla a chiunque nella tua gilda privatamente.
La petizione selezionata e' stata cancellata.

item.orig: You are ignoring all replies from that person.
item.trans: Stai ignorando tutte le risposte da quella persona.

item.orig: Sei sicuro di voler caricare il tuo personaggio?
Save the password in configurations files for easier login
Do you really want to reset options to default values?
Enables the logging of the selected chat type

item.trans: Gestisci le petizioni per aiutare gli utenti.

item.orig: The number of hexas that you may exchange.
The number of trias you wish to deposit.
The number of circles you wish to deposit.

You can change the language of PlaneShift to have the user interface displayed in your language. We support Cesky, Dutch, French, Italian, German, Romanian, Russian, Swedish, and more. Please note pubic dialogues in game between players should be in English.
Changing the language can be done ONLY in the PlaneShift Launcher. To do this you should close this client, and relaunch PlaneShift. In the Launcher you should change the 'Language' dropdown.
Add a comment about this event if you wish
item.trans: Aggiungi un commento su questo evento

item.orig: The number of hexas you wish to deposit.
Perform an action see by people in your vicinity.
item.trans: Esegui un azione visibile dalle persone nelle tue vicinanze.

item.orig: Please enter a full name for mother
The number of circles you wish to withdraw.
You must be assigned to a petition in order to close it.
You do not have an equipped musical instrument to play.
The selected petition has been escalated.
Describe the petition and how you've helped
You cannot have a negative CP value.

Before clicking next again, please make sure that your character name is not offensive and would be appropriate for a medieval setting. It must be unique and not similar to that of any real person or thing. The game forums can be found at: http://www.hydlaa.com/smf/

A full name is required, the first & last name separated with a space. You can use any alphabetic (A-Z) in your name, but no numbers. Each name must be between 3 and 27 letters. If your name is inappropriate, a Game Master (GM) will change it.
Please enter valid names for both parents

This window is what people will read when they click on you; this box is not to be filled with anything other than things that a person could reasonably perceive with their senses. There is no reason to include anything beyond what one can sense when looking at your character. While sensual detail ONLY is to be included, this does not mean that you should be sparing, please include as many appeals to the senses as your character clearly eminates that can be sensed with the five accepted senses (sight, touch, hearing and smell (being primary)(only list taste if you anticipate people tasting your character)). If you are on the non rp server: Not only can you disregard the above, but you are encouraged to include epic descriptions of all sorts, quote great authors and even recite your own unpublished novels with no limitation whatsoever.

Here you can place any OOC information except to advertise companies, products, or services from the real world.
To disable this feature delete everything in the window by using the Modify Description button.
item.trans:
Qua puoi mettere qualunque informazione OOC eccetto publicità di compagnie, prodotti o servizi del mondo reale.
Per disabilitare questa funzione cancella tutto in questa finestra usando il bottone Modifica Descizione.

item.orig: List all of the petitions you have submitted.
item.trans: Lista tutte le petizioni che hai inoltrato.

item.orig: You must select a petition from the list in order to assign yourself.
item.trans: Devi selezionare una petizione dalla lista per potertela assegnare.

item.orig: The number of circles that you may exchange.

In this section you can configure the keys associated to actions, for example the keys used for movement.
You can also change the commands sent by each mouse button.
No more than 2 letters in a row allowed
Warning! this will PERMANENTLY DELETE your character. Are you sure you want to continue?

item.trans: Attacchi di altri che vengono bloccati

item.orig: The number of hexas you wish to withdraw.

IMPORTANT: If you are not hearing any sound, be sure it's enabled. At the moment enabling sound is available ONLY in the PlaneShift launcher.
If you want to check this, you need to close this client, and relaunch PlaneShift. In the Launcher window, click on 'Settings' and 'Audio'.
Talk to the people in your immediate vicinity.
item.trans: Parla alle persone nelle tue immediate vicinanze.
Impossibile risolvere il nome di host del server.

item.orig: Makes the server log what target player is saying.
item.trans: Fa loggare al server ciò che il giocare selezionato sta dicendo.

item.orig: The server is not running or is not reachable. Please check the website or forums for more info.
The number of octas you wish to deposit.
Click a character name below, then click Join. Or click New Character.
item.trans: Seleziona un personaggio e clicca Entra oppure clicca Nuovo Personaggio.

item.orig: Please wait for verification from server
item.trans: Prego attendere la verifica dal server

item.orig: You must select a petition from the list in order to close it.
item.trans: Devi selezionare una petizione dalla lista in modo da poterla chiudere.

item.orig: You must select a petition from the list in order to escalate it.

item.trans: Ci sono delle petizioni in attesa.

item.orig: Allow the client to send a newly hashed password to the server (check: http://tinyurl.com/5smsz5l )
Enable spell checker in chat window

item.trans: In attesa dei dati dal server...

item.orig: The number of octas you wish to withdraw.
You must select a petition from the list in order to view it.
item.trans: Devi selezionare una petizione dalla lista per poterla vedere

item.orig: You have been deassigned from the selected petition.
